profile.details: I am an organized, focused, dedicated, motivated, intelligent, productive and ambitious professional software engineer. I am interested in working with experienced professionals within a team and contribute to the success of a dynamic project development. I am looking for a long-term position.

jobDiscription: Developing new features for existing infrastructure, content and process-oriented proprietary desktop application using Java for full-stack application development using Swing, MySQL, Docker, Jenkins, Maven, Nexus, Git, Jira, XML, JSON, BASH, HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Addressing bug fixes and processes for workflow with regards to software systems and focusing on security, integrity, robustness, and complexity of different software requirements and features. Provided API driven back-end micro-services using Java Spring.

Developed complex data structures and algorithms for data generation of lottery tickets. Maintained, developed, debugged, and tested complex code base in C++, C. Developed deeper understanding of performance and production-oriented software. Worked as a part of team to efficiently manage and contribute to deadline driven development. Analyzed data of various complexity and successfully fixed issues with respect to data integrity, data distribution, and correctness.

education.discription: Full-Stack software development diploma from MITT, Manitoba, Canada
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering from GTU, Gujarat, India

tools: Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate, JPA, J2EE, Python, C++, C#, .NET Framework, Entity Framework, MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL, TensorFlow, Swing Framework, Perl Scripting, Bash Scripting, JavaScript, React, NodeJS, HTML, DHTML, CSS, jQuery, PHP, Docker, Git, Jira, Jenkins, Nexus, Linux

projects.name: Book-Tracker
projects.discription: This project is a web application for digital library system which helps with keeping track of books. You can save the books that you want to read into your profile, and keep track of the reading list for which books you would want to read, books you are currently reading and books that you have already read.

projects.name: Restaurant-Review
projects.discription: This project is a web-based restaurant finder which helps finding restaurants. It shows you best restaurants near your location on a map and showcases comments of previous visitors for that restaurant.

projects.name: Chess
projects.discription: Game of Chess is GitHub hosted website and can be played online. It is a multiplayer game. You can open it on the browser and can play with another friend.
